dialogue.describe: If'n us'll to add the metal an' plastic for ye, us'll need two jars o' them anus-feticks, one for your thinkin'-meat an' one for our stock.
dialogue.offer: If'n us'll to add the metal an' plastic for ye, us'll need two jars o' them anus-feticks, one for your thinkin'-meat an' one for our stock.
dialogue.rejected: That be a choice an' you can tass.  Come back to this'n if you like.
dialogue.advice: Check round the chirurgery an' such, I'd razz.
dialogue.inquire: Us'n waits patient-like for those kits.
dialogue.success: Fine an' fine.  We can pass it in when you like.
dialogue.success_lie: Fine an' fine.  We can pass it in when you like.
dialogue.failure: Fine an' fine.  Come back to this'n if you like to try again.
